title: BDK All Weather Rubber Floor Mats for Car SUV & Truck - 4 Pieces Set (Front & Rear), Trimmable, Heavy Duty Protection
description: BDK 4-piece floor mats protect not only the vehicle's driver and front passenger floors, but also your rear floor. Made from an original patented material, these rubber mats will hold up to the harsh elements, preventing stains and moisture to the original factory carpets. Easily clean mats with soap and hot or cold water and a mild brush, no harsh scrubbing or special cleaners needed special anti-skid nib backing will prevent any slipping or movement on contact. Keep your focus on your driving, and not on adjusting your car mats keep your car floor in pristine condition, easily, from the trusted brand in automotive car accessories, BDK measurements: front mats: 27.5" x 17", rear mats: 16.5" x 18".
